Hi, my name is Marco Campos. I'm a FLOSS enthusiast that just happens to love Ubuntu :) I work as an IT Consultant using .NET, Java and Python as my weapons of choice. Feel free to contact me if you have any interesting projects in your mind or just wanna have a talk about Ubuntu, GNU/Linux or FLOSS in general.
